TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebBaseErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 作为所有运行状况监视错误事件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all the health-monitoring error events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是表示错误条件的运行状况监视事件的基类。The class is the base class for the health-monitoring events that represent error conditions. ASP.NET 使用及其派生类型，以指示在 Web 应用程序的生存期内的错误条件。ASP.NET uses and its derived types to indicate error conditions during the lifetime of a Web application. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一个是使 ASP.NET 运行状况监视，以便使用派生自某个事件的配置文件的摘录类。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET health monitoring to use an event derived from the class. 第二部分演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The second shows how to derive from the class to create the custom event. ``` ``` 下面的代码演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The following code shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/CS/weberrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/VB/weberrorevent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从一个构造函数调用此构造函数`SampleWebBaseErrorEvent`类，派生的类类。The following code example shows how to call this constructor from a constructor for the `SampleWebBaseErrorEvent` class, a class that derives from the class. summary.span: 递增与性能相关的事件-错误计数器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法增加了以下性能计数器：This method increments the following performance counters: - 基础结构引发错误事件。Infrastructure Error Events Raised. 这是一个全局计数器，用于跟踪引发的错误事件。This is a global counter that tracks the error events raised. - 引发的错误事件。Error Events Raised. 这是特定于应用程序的计数器，用于跟踪自应用程序启动以来引发的错误事件数。This is an application-specific counter that tracks the number of error events raised since the application started. 此方法还会调用父，引发的事件计数器时都会增加。This method also calls the parent , which increments the Events Raised counter. 此计数器可跟踪引发的事件的总数。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要查看这些性能计数器在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**中**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择你想要查看，请单击性能计数器**添加**按钮。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409)在 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
